summary: This is a certified time and attendance summary for an employee, covering the pay period from August 4, 2019, to August 17, 2019. It details regular hours, overtime, leave, and flags multiple payroll transactions for overtime without corresponding approved requests. The document was validated and certified on August 20, 2019.

events.title: Payroll Certification
events.description: The time and attendance summary was validated and certified by authorized personnel.

keyFacts: The document is a payroll time and attendance summary for the pay period August 4, 2019, to August 17, 2019.

Multiple payroll transactions for overtime (Over 40 in addition) are flagged for lacking corresponding approved requests, specifically on 08/05/2019, 08/07/2019, 08/11/2019, 08/12/2019, 08/14/2019, and 08/16/2019.
The summary was validated on August 20, 2019, at 11:56 AM and certified on the same day at 12:09 PM.
